data.text: "NOK BUSSARAKAM" our 10th Anniversary special livery takes off from Seattle and is on her way to her nest in Bangkok. http://t.co/DTmj7cy00B
@ozpromsuk Nok Bussarakam :)
Our new 10th Anniversary baby Nok is about to leave Seattle to join her nest in Bangkok #avgeek #nokair #Boeing http://t.co/SksC0TBJ6l
A special visit to the @BoeingAirplanes factory in Everett, Washington #avgeek #boeing http://t.co/cQcKlPVAuo
RT @Patee122: Have a great long weekend!! From us at Nok Air.. And thanks so much for flying with us!!! http://t.co/Aqde2ohhB0
@01_rhys On flights to Buriram we operate with an ATR72-500 aircraft
@DobbyChihuahua Happy to see Kris and family on Nok Air. We hope you signed him up for our Nok Kid's Club :)
@DobbyChihuahua @RichardBarrow He wins the internet today :)
Don't miss your chance to book this special offer 899THB to 10 of our destinations.Book now at http://t.co/t7zWey8rHb http://t.co/xGKiqarIH7
It's lunch time! Anyone up for delicious Shaun noodle from Myanmar? This is a must try dish in Yangon! http://t.co/IkQpCdHDUh
Hi @01_rhys please check our website http://t.co/fPAEAFDHYb for the latest promotions :)
@MuchoTweets glad to hear you are able to get through. Let us know if you need anything else :)
@MuchoTweets Hi Chris, we just tried and it works. Could you try again and let us know?
@MuchoTweets Hi Chris, apologies for that. Let us check and get back to you soon.
Our Nok Dudes and Babes are always on hand to assist elderly passengers and those who need assistance http://t.co/gCYeJCT2qj
PP Project performs the new single "Look Into my Eyes" http://t.co/JzOu2TlHSC
PP Project takes the stage at Hard Rock Cafe, let the fun begin! http://t.co/4Ro7XwMcY2
@n49th thanks for the feedback, Jason. We hope to see you onboard again soon :)
Good news for coffee lovers. Check out what's onboard our new Q400 http://t.co/1Wg7szmmr9
Do you have a fear of tight spaces or knee pain when flying? We have the fix for that! #Thailand #PaxEx http://t.co/2QKmgfQWh4
Wouldn't it be nice to pay less for your holiday? Check http://t.co/MZfjz5dPjD for our special offer! Booking 2-7 Jul http://t.co/TkaGlpNjlH
Hello Khon Kaen :) thanks for the awesome welcome. 2 Daily flights full of smiles starting from today. #Thailand http://t.co/TkN8wjKVRk
Our first flight lands in Khon Kaen to an awesome water canon salute. Hello Khon Kaen! #Thailand http://t.co/BO7Dni87Bv
@Khon_Kaen Thanks for the welcome! We are very excited.
We're ready to welcome our passengers in an inaugural flight from Bangkok to Khon Kaen. http://t.co/O35MR5GUxg
@psongfa We are definitely different.. not the same :)
Nok Air and Hard Rock Café is giving away 500THB vouchers for 5 lucky winners. Join us at http://t.co/xZ3sB0XNPl http://t.co/9A1c1dhwpX
@psongfa we just had a one day exclusive sale for Nok Fan Club members, unfortunately you missed it.
@psongfa Depends on the flight, and we have 7 daily flights, you can check on our website.
@psongfa You can check our all-inclusive fares with no hidden costs at http://t.co/fPAEAFDHYb :) Let us know if you have any questions
Today day only! Round trip tickets for Bangkok-Yangon starting at 1,799 THB. Book now http://t.co/0aZalDcDhP http://t.co/JqgaUEk9HR
For our Japanese followers, check out Nok Air CEO Patee Sarasin's interview in The Nikkei. http://t.co/8yMuBo1ato
Visit Nakhon Si Thammarat, the city of southern comfort with Nok Air. http://t.co/xvVhfzW0kw
Hello Khon Kaen! We are ready and excited to starting fly from DMK with 2 daily flights starting 1 July. #Thailand http://t.co/61BuUTuhk8
Nok Air is excited to continue to expand our domestic network with flights to Khon Kaen starting 1 July, 2014. #Thailand
Suriyapa Bunnag, VP of Corporate Communications at Nok Air visits Khon Kaen Governor Kamthorn Thawornsathit http://t.co/DTeWFTkhm1
Nok Air and Centara offer you a special privilege. Pay less for your holiday. Read more info: http://t.co/wlkV1sdP1K http://t.co/csQceLjwgz
@FHavg definitely not เซ็งเป็ด! She is coming very soon ;) keep an eye out!
@FHavg You'll have to wait and see ;)
Our new baby nok is about to hatch.... #avgeek #boeing http://t.co/1zO5ArEUON
NokScoot Cabin Crew recruitment! Are you different enough to join us? Online application at http://t.co/7WL13xUsRp http://t.co/vumf8qS6xJ
Only for Nok Fan Club member! special fare starting at 799 THB. Booking at http://t.co/IhVnAdc3hA http://t.co/RToyundS7y
Bye bye Nakhon Si Thammarat http://t.co/XtP21i11VB
If you are seafood lover, we recommend you to try Tha Sala Seafood. http://t.co/pAjNeXCxh3
Tired of waiting in line? Well now you can skip the line with Nok Air's new mobile check-in with 4 easy steps. http://t.co/clvZDEFtwe
HI @iamanuragj we are very happy to know that you enjoyed your experience. We hope to see you again, and hope you enjoy Phuket :)
Good morning from Khanom beach! Anyone missing the fresh ocean breeze? http://t.co/UsFfH4PRqB
Celebrating the night with a BBQ party at AAVA Resort&Spa http://t.co/VPE7j2bSWC
Having lunch at Ruean Pak Goot, before we take a tour to Khanom District. http://t.co/dwBG25Zq95
Now we are at Ban Khiri Wong, an ancient community which settled at the foot of Khao Luang. http://t.co/8F5Pd2s87R
Ready, set, Go! http://t.co/fkQFRQ5prP
This morning we are honored to join the open ceremony of the 2nd Nakhon Sri Thammarat Bicycle race. http://t.co/xr9fF5D23L
We're ready for 2nd Nakhon Sri Thammarat Bicycle race Tour of Srivichai. http://t.co/Yn56oXk7xg
Take a rest at Kopi Coffee shop. Who wants a cup? http://t.co/clsDLlvBMt
The beauty of Wat Phra Mahathat Woramahawihan at night. http://t.co/pqZqFYMrjZ
Ho Phra Isuan and Ho Phra Narai - these two shrines are a historical site to worship Brahman god - Shiva and Narayana http://t.co/zRhd7OExUH
Nakhon Si Thammarat city wall, runs parallel with the city moat for 100 metres. http://t.co/fa6h4E1owD
The Pradu trees pavilion was originally outside the city wall, used as an accommodation for travelers. http://t.co/JXqmueZbaK
Governor of Nakhon Sri Thammarat welcome Nok Air and press team and paying respect at the City Pillar Shrine. http://t.co/S4L8O9j48d
Checked and prepared our bikes for tonight’s ride. http://t.co/N9i84rNkPj
Take a photo before going to start our tonight’s ride. Stay tuned with our live feed! http://t.co/1sQuXP6MEg
Dining at Nam Choup restaurant, Nakhon Si Thammarat. http://t.co/2gx7lANHeK
If you visit Nakhon Sri Thammarat, you must try "Ka nom jeen Mueang Kon" at Ka nom jeen Panyom restaurant. http://t.co/snz4oymIsM
Fly your bike for free with Nok Air step: 1.Pack your Bike in Bike baggage 2. Deflate the tires and it’s ready to fly http://t.co/6DugORO5nO
Today we'll fly to Nakhon Sri Thammarat for our “Ride on Bike” press trip, stay tuned with our live feed! http://t.co/e0l4ZkW5go
RT @Patee122: Explaining wifi on board http://t.co/yvx6yrOvjB
@jieggens You can contact customer care at http://t.co/M0hwMgWrvK or call +662-900-9955.
Hi @jieggens please kindly contact our call center at 1318 and press 9 for English. Thank you very much.
Our sales counter is now open at Khon Kaen Airport, we're excited to starting flying to on July 1, 2014! #Thailand http://t.co/3JFv0IORpZ
@n49th thanks, we think we love you too, Jason. #mutualfeelings
@FHavg thanks!
NokScoot got the green light from Nok Air's Board of Directors today and will be ready for take off soon!
@Patee122 Inflight WiFi will be free for passengers on Nok Air. The only low cost carrier with free wifi http://t.co/EpkyaO0hFH
@Patee122 "We are always being innovative to differentiate from our competitors" at #CommunicAsia2014 http://t.co/4SqVY6ujjg
@Patee122 and Patompob Suwansiri, CMO of Thaicom  at #CommunicAsia2014 in Singapore. http://t.co/2DCzrNoY8t
@Patee122 talks about the country's political unrest, the company's business strategy, and fuel prices. via Bloomberg http://t.co/fea7mSrwU6
Best value! with our special fare starting from 898 THB. Start booking 18-23 June 14 at http://t.co/E2pUPFlMxF http://t.co/7hBpP3kfHq
One of the unseen places in Thailand - Sam Pan Boak, amazing view of the rock reef, located in Ubon Ratchathani. http://t.co/kxov2xDdlY
Good news for a Friday night - the curfew has been lifted nation wide and effective immediately. Who's happy? #Thailand #ThaiCoup
Nok Air partnered with Tourism Authority of Thailand launched the promotion Hug Isan Book now http://t.co/heBAL03ZUe http://t.co/p4t2MeIw35
Nok Air is increasing flights for Ubon Ratchathani and Sakon Nakhon. Book now at http://t.co/fcWsTiVweq http://t.co/uOITFTuPLM
@KarthickPrabu This is the article in Thai, which caused the confusion http://t.co/2nam02PGFR
@DaoThuHang Please check you inbox in facebook. Thank you.
Nok Air give you an offer 20% discount off. Book this offer now til 12 June, 2014 at http://t.co/jiAudStmN1 http://t.co/aHivOm0wEQ
@jockywilson10 unfortunately the other Nok did not survive to give their side of the story. RIP.
Hi @ChadapornLin please let us verify that this is not true. Nok Air was not involved in any incident.
We would like to clarify that Nok Air did not clip another aircraft today, the other aircraft suffered a bird (real ones) strike.
@DaoThuHang Could you please verify if you are traveling on the same date and flight? So we can process the booking.
Pha That Doi Tung is a stupa that contains the clavicle part of Buddha's remains. Located in Mae Sai, Chiang Rai. http://t.co/GinaGa8qhJ
@DaoThuHang Your booking has been voided from the system and not charged to your card. It is recommended to book the tickets in USD.
@DaoThuHang Please check with the issuing bank of your credit card, as our system indicates that it was declined.
@DaoThuHang We have received it and forwarded the information to the customer care center. We'll get back to your soon.
@DaoThuHang Your booking did not finish. Please send us the last 4 digits of your credit card to our inbox on FB https://t.co/16yQzE8lTi
@DaoThuHang We're working to get your confirmation email sent. If the credit card is already charged, then your flight is already booked.
@DaoThuHang May we confirm the booking name is under Dao Thu Hang?
Hi @DaoThuHang could you please give us the name on the booking and date of travel? We will look into this for you, thank you :)
Nok Air is excited to launch new service from Bangkok-Khon Kaen with 2 daily flights. Book now http://t.co/lV4m4EFd8S http://t.co/0QCBvo0NqT
Nok Air's Mega Sale special offers 737 THB for domestic routes. Start booking June 9, 2014 at http://t.co/jmQEIpAVL5 http://t.co/Vw6Iw4aOjX
Don't miss our Mega Sale with extra special fares. Can you guess how much the fare will be? Here's a hint! http://t.co/i54iMr0Nkb
Nok Air is adding a new destination in Thailand. Can you guess where we'll be flying to next? http://t.co/rrYzolZuiH
